prompt: <description>**Part 1: Rectangular Prism** Construct a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. The sides are parallel and the top and bottom faces are perpendicular to the sides. The dimensions of the prism are 2 units in length, 1 unit in width, and 0.5 units in height. Begin by creating a new coordinate system with the following parameters: - Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] - Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] Now, create the 2D sketch for the base of the prism on the XY plane of the coordinate system using the following steps: - Draw a rectangle with four lines. - Line 1: Start Point: [0.0, 0.0], End Point: [0.4687, 0.0] - Line 2: Start Point: [0.4687, 0.0], End Point: [0.4687, 0.75] - Line 3: Start Point: [0.4687, 0.75], End Point: [0.0, 0.75] - Line 4: Start Point: [0.0, 0.75], End Point: [0.0, 0.0] After creating the 2D sketch, proceed to scale it by a factor of 0.75 using the sketch_scale parameter. Next, transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch by applying a 3D rotation using the euler angles and a translation vector according to the coordinate system. Finally, extrude the 3D sketch to generate the 3D model of the rectangular prism. The extrusion depth towards the normal should be 0.0352 units, and the extrusion depth opposite the normal should be 0 units. The sketch scale is already set to 0.75 units. The resulting prism will have the following dimensions: - Length: 0.75 units - Width: 0.75 units - Height: 0.0352 units (0.0352 from the extrusion_depth_towards_normal and 0.0 from the extrusion_depth_opposite_normal, both multiplied by 0.75)</description>
completion:
<json>
{"parts":{"part_1":{"coordinate_system":{"Euler Angles":[0.0,0.0,0.0],"Translation Vector":[0.0,0.0,0.0]},"sketch":{"face_1":{"loop_1":{"line_1":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.0],"End Point":[0.4687,0.0]},"line_2":{"Start Point":[0.4687,0.0],"End Point":[0.4687,0.75]},"line_3":{"Start Point":[0.4687,0.75],"End Point":[0.0,0.75]},"line_4":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.75],"End Point":[0.0,0.0]}}}},"extrusion":{"extrude_depth_towards_normal":0.0352,"extrude_depth_opposite_normal":0.0,"sketch_scale":0.75,"operation":"NewBodyFeatureOperation"}}}}
</json>
